Title: The Devil Comes Here and Sighs
Writer: Julie Plec (created by), Kyle Arrington, Michelle Paradise, Declan De Barra (executive story editor), Ashley Lyle (executive story editor), Bart Nickerson (executive story editor), Michael Russo (executive story editor), Carina Adly MacKenzie (story editor), L.J. Smith (based in part on the character Klaus from "The Vampire Diaries" novels by)
Actors: Joseph Morgan, Daniel Gillies, Phoebe Tonkin, Charles Michael Davis
Plot: As the city celebrates its annual Jazz Fest, an unlikely team of Mikaelson foes joins forces to take Klaus hostage. Leading the charge to get their brother back, Elijah and Freya face off ...
